H0.text: What is nicknamed 'The Cathedral of the Railways'. St Pancras railway station

H1.text: What is nicknamed 'The Cathedral of the Railways'. Grand Central Terminal

H2.text: What is nicknamed 'The Cathedral of the Railways'. Liverpool Lime Street station

H3.text: What is nicknamed 'The Cathedral of the Railways'. Pangratios

A4.text: St Pancras has retained a reputation of having one of the most recognisable facades of all the London termini, and known as the 'cathedral of the railways'
